Your Neighborhood Pub
Our Story
O'Brian's Irish Pub is a family-owned and operated business that has been serving the Boca Raton community since 2009. We offer a full bar and restaurant open daily from 11am to 2am 365 days a year. We are committed to providing our guests with a warm and welcoming atmosphere, delicious food and drinks, and live entertainment.
We hope to see you soon!
The Days
Join us for happy hour 11am-8pm Monday through Friday.
During these hours you can look forward to great drink specials while enjoying the endless selection of delicious food from our kitchen. Come eat, drink, and be merry!
Try our rotating Sunday football specials ranging from Brian's famous rack of ribs to our fried lobster sandwich served with homemade blue cheese coleslaw.
Our Nightly Specials!
Nightly Specials:
Margarita Monday: DJ Ginger, $3 Tacos and $5 Margaritas
Turnt Up Tuesday: DJ MAD, BOGO High Noon
Karaoke Wednesday: KJ Aaron, $6 Cheeseburger w/Fries
Thirsty Thursday: DJ Nick Block, 50% off for ITB, $8 Philly Cheesesteak w/Fries
Fired up Friday: DJ BeatsByHunt
Saturday/Sunday: College and NFL with bucket and food specials!
DJ MAD Saturday Nights
